author: Special Correspondent
text:
The election authorities have began the process of pasting stickers highlighting importance of voting in Erode district on Monday.— PHOTO: M. GOVARTHAN

The election authorities on Monday stepped up efforts to reach the public with messages of importance of voting through pasting of awareness stickers on domestic gas cylinders.

The awareness initiative, envisaged to reach every individual household, was launched by District Collector S. Prabakar at Moolapalayam in the city, in the presence of District Revenue Officer R. Satheesh and Revenue Divisional Officer R. Narmada Devi, who is the Returning Officer for Erode West Assembly.

The district administration has so far organised rallies, mini marathons, human chains, cultural programmes, signature campaigns and administering of oaths with an aim to achieve cent per cent polling.

The Collector said that ramps would be installed in every booth for the convenience of the differently-abled, alongside provision of water and power.
title: Stickers on gas cylinders propagate voter awareness
